data.author: moridh

changelog.release_notes:
Added battery indicator:
- a small dot along the border between inner and outer boxes
- dot at 1 o'clock = 10%, at 2 o'clock = 20%, and so on...
- another dot at 11 o'clock while charging
- another dot at 12 o'clock while plugged

data.description:
Minimalistic design.
Outer white square divided into 12 segments representing the hour (where the hour hand would normally be).
Inner black square divided into 12 (triangular) segments representing 5 minute intervals (minute hand).
The lower black area is divided into 4 rectangular segments representing additional 1 minute intervals.
Shown: 2:52

latest_release.release_notes:
Added battery indicator:
- a small dot along the border between inner and outer boxes
- dot at 1 o'clock = 10%, at 2 o'clock = 20%, and so on...
- another dot at 11 o'clock while charging
- another dot at 12 o'clock while plugged

data.title: Geomatrix 2.0
